descriptionHtml:
Inspired by the mask shown in the Dark Souls II trailer.
This is my first mod made from scratch, so I'm sorry I didn't quite get the look of the mask like it is in the trailer.
I hope you'll like it anyway.
I recommend using a hood or anything that covers your hair like:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28147/]zzjay and Grace Darklings Hoods with hairs[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3201]Fur Hoods HD[/url]
I made it using the female head as a base and I didn't adjust it for males, so it might look stupid on males.
author: KaranVess
